blocks.name: isrnghm
blocks.content: A function is a non-unital ring homomorphism iff it is a group homomorphism and preserves multiplication. (Contributed by AV, 22-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: isrnghmmul
blocks.content: A function is a non-unital ring homomorphism iff it preserves both addition and multiplication. (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmgp, c1))

} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, co(c1, crngh, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crng), wcel(c2, crng)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmgmhm, c4)))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crng), wcel(c2, crng)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))))))

thm isrnghmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[RngHomo]c2))

  ‚ä£ c5 =(√ó ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Rng)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Rng)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(c0 `(s0[c4]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c5](c0 ` s1)))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(+ ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(+ ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c3 ‚Üí c6))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(c0 `(s0[c7]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c8](c0 ` s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c8)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c8)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {

  mpbird((c0 ‚àà(c1[RngHomo]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)), `' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c1), (c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4))

  biimpa(c0 ‚àà(c1[RngHomo]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4), (c0 :(Base `(mulGrp ` c1))‚Üî(Base `(mulGrp ` c2))))
  f1oeq123d(c0, c3, c4, c0, (Base `(mulGrp ` c1)), (Base `(mulGrp ` c2)), c0 ‚àà(c1[RngHomo]c2))
  eqidd(c0, c0 ‚àà(c1[RngHomo]c2))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(c1[RngHomo]c2), c3 =(Base `(mulGrp ` c1)))

blocks.name: isrngim

blocks.name: rngimrnghm
blocks.content: An isomorphism of non-unital rings is a homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 23-Feb-2020.)
